channel.title: Posts on My Summer in Portugal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My Summer in Portugal

item.title: My First Post
item.description: After spending a week in the lovely country of Portugal with my mom, I had been blessed with the opportunity to spend six weeks doing Data Science. The past week, I ventured to Douro Valley and Lisbon at two magnificent hotels called Six Senses and The One Palacio de Anunciades. We walked all over Lisbon, ate delicious pastries, and traveled to Sintra.
